rules_text:
Gamma Experiment enters with X +1/+1 counters on it.
At the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on Gamma Experiment.
{T}, Sacrifice Gamma Experiment: Create a tapped 0/0 black Giant Horror creature token, then put Gamma Experiment's counters on that creature.
